column4: i need help with an odd screen resolution problem, I edited xorg.cong to get my resolution set to 1440x900, and it works, except that Ubuntu/Gnome still thinks the resolution is 1280x800, so I can see on the entire screen, but the window and font sizes are all still 1280x800, when i pull up System->Screen Resolution I can only setit ot 1280x800
